ygData.subject: RE: warrior upgrade in new patch
ygData.msgSnippet: My character that I am referring to is my second character.  I have not checked the stats on Dyvim yet.  Dyvim is level 32, and I have not logged in with him
ygData.messageBody:
My character that I am referring to is my second character. I have not
checked the stats on Dyvim yet. Dyvim is level 32, and I have not logged in
with him for a while, will need to check him for the record. My second
warrior on Quellious is level 20. My critical strikes both hit for 59
points with a strength of 125 weilding the avenger axe damage 16 i believe.
Hit points i believe are at 649. Hope this helps.. I will try to remember
to play Dyvim tonight to get the stats on him, tho I can not really remember
how many hit points I had before the patch, its been a while since I played
him.

Dyvim Kincaid 32
Cazic Thule
Daks 20
Quellious (or however you spell it *grin)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Trent Carroll [mailto:trent@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 10:22 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] warrior upgrade in new patch
>
>
> From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>
>
> Dyvim,
>
> For my reference what is your character level?
>
> I read on the forums today that HP increases hit at 20, 30, 40,
> 50. Someone
> said they read that in the patch message. I read the entire patch message
> (I thought) and saw nothing mentioned at all.
>
> Kindrael
>
